original_title: Sri Lanka bond yields steady in mid-day trade
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s bond yields were steady in the mid-day trade on Wednesday as results of a bill auction is awaited, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2025 was trading at 31.75/32.00 percent, steady from 32.00/20 percent on Tuesday.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 was trading at 28.20/40 percent, steady from 28.00/30 percent on Tuesday. (Colombo/ Mar 15/2023)
